content: उद्यम् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (<ab>P.</ab> in some cases) {@--1@} To raise, elevate, lift up; बाहू उद्यम्य <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; परस्य दंडं नोद्यच्छेत् <ls>Ms. 4. 164</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">8. 280</ls>; <ls>Bg. 1. 20</ls>; <ls>R. 15. 23</ls>, <ls n="R.">11. 17</ls>; भारमुद्यच्छते <ls>Sk.</ls>; <ls>Bk. 4. 31</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">17. 92.</ls> {@--2@} To offer, give. {@--3@} To prepare, become ready for, begin, set about (with <ab>dat.</ab>, <ab>loc.</ab> or <ab>inf.</ab>); उद्यच्छमाना गमनाय पश्चात् <ls>R. 16. 29</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 47</ls>; see उद्यत. {@--4@} To strive, be diligent, strive hard for; उद्यच्छति वेदं <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--5@} To reign, manage, govern. {@--6@} To keep back, stop, hinder. {@--7@} To rise. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To prompt, stimulate; <ls>Ki. 9. 66.</ls>
